me.hsgamer.hscore.addon

Class AddonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.hsgamer.hscore.addon.AddonManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PluginAddonManager, SimpleAddonManager

    public abstract class AddonManager
extends Object
    A class that manages all addons in it
